SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.1_1: varadāṃ ca mayā natvā kriyate jayamaṃgalam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.3_1: namo namo mayā samyag ucyate citralakṣaṇam //

SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.4_1: viṣṇvindrau sūryamagniṃ ca varuṇaṃ marutaṃ tathā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.13_0: varṇāśramā hi catvāro na cyutā dharmatatparāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.14_1: bhayajito manaḥ śuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tapasi drutam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.19_1: kathaṃ rodiṣi bho vipra cetyapṛcchad dvijaṃ nṛpaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.21_0: tato 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ taṃ śāssīdaṃ nṛpa niścitam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.21_1: viṣmayo ya itaḥ pūrvaṃ na jāto 'sau pravartate //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.23_0: bramha priyau hi rājan tvaṃ sarva jānāsi bhūtale /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.23_1: prāṇatulyaṃ sutaṃ mahyaṃ dehi svāmin kṛpānvitaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.24_0: dayāṃ yadi na kuryāstvaṃ śaktiman guṇavan nṛpa /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.25_1: ākarṣaṇe sutaṃ tasya matiṃ cakre nṛpālakaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.29_1: viśvakarman dvijanmane asmai prītyā ca dhīmate //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.30_0: śrutvā pretādhipo vākyaṃ pūjanīyaṃ hasan nṛpam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.30_1: dadau pratyuttaraṃ mṛdu tejasā pūritaṃ vacaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.32_0: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ karmavaśaṃ sadā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.32_1: tasmāt rājan vijānīyān mayā naiva pragṛhyate //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.34_1: karmānusāriṇī bhūmir vijñeyā ca sadā nṛṇām //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.36_0: na śakyate na śakyate yama āha punaḥ punaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.36_1: dehi dehi sutaṃ deva rājñāpi prārthitaḥ punaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.37_1: vyākulau tī mahāyuddhe tadā liptau babhūvatuḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.38_0: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti ta rājā bahuśaḥ prāha vīrahā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.38_1: sthito 'smīti raṇe rājan tamavocad nṛpaṃ yamaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.44_0: tataḥ pretādhipo devo dṛṣṭvā taṃ tu parājitam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.47_0: duḥkhitāṃ sakalāṃ pṛthvīṃ dṛsṭvā brahmā tathā suraiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.47_1: ājagāma svayaṃ tatra tasmin deśe raṇākule //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.48_1: sāñjaliḥ pūjayitvā taṃ prāha yathāyathaṃ vacaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.49_2: pratyāvṛtya raṇād devaḥ kathayāmāsa tau tadā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.51_0: purā śubhāśubhaṃ karma tathā ca śiśunā kṛtam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.51_1: labdhañca maraṇaṃ śīghra janma prāpya ca mānuṣam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.57_1: yamadutā jitāḥ śaktyā sādhu sādhu kṛtaṃ tvayā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.58_0: brahmāṇā kathite tvevaṃ sa rājā harṣamāptavām /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.59_1: brahmā svayaṃ samāśvāsya bhūpatiṃ prāha sattamaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.60_0: dharmanītiḥ suvijñāya na nindet kāmapi prajām /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.61_0: yatra sevā satāṃ nāsti tatra nindā bhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.61_1: nālpamapi sukhaṃ kiñcid āpnoti nindukaḥ sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.63_1: jātyā balena dānena naipuṇyena ca vidyayā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.65_1: kṣamāvalambanīyā syāt nindā tyājyā tathaiva ca /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.66_0: puruṣaṃ vacanaṃ tyājyam āghātaṃ visṛjet sadā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.66_1: pratyakṣaṃ prāpyate yattu sārthakyaṃ tasya cintayet //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.67_1: vidhiyaṃ naiva kāryaṃ hi yamasyāpi tato nṛpa //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.68_0: brahmaṇetthaṃ sa bhūpālo hy upadiṣṭo dvijapriyaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.70_0: atha brahmā nṛpaṃ prāha nagnaṃ pretaṃ nivāraya /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.70_1: yamadāsaiḥ sadā viśvaṃ na pātayed bhavān khalu //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.71_0: balena tejasā cāpi tapasemaṃ guṇaṃ nṛpāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.72_0: bhavān mahāyaśasvī ca karaṇīyo mayā kṣitau /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.77_1: adya prabhṛti taccitra jagadvandyaṃ bhavet sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.80_1: sarve nemuśca bhaktyā taṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokapālakam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.83_1: yasmād deśāt samāpannas tatraiva praviveśa ca //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.85_0: sarvarūpānukūlaṃ tat mānaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.85_1: tat praṣṭuṃ sṛṣṭikattariṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.86_1: citrasya lakṣaṇāni me nānāvidhāni santi ca //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.87_0: parimāṇaṃ kimasya syāt vidhinā kīdṛśena vā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.88_0: brahmātha prāha bhūpendraṃ śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.88_1: atiguhyaṃ mahad vākyaṃ paramaṃ kathayāmi te //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.89_1: tataḥ prajā mayā sṛṣṭā upadiṣṭāśca tā mayā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.90_1: vedāccitraṃ prajātaṃ vai tasmād jñeyaṃ tathaiva tat //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.92_1: yathā nareṣu bhūpendras tathā citraṃ kalāsu vai //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.94_0: himālayo yathā śreṣṭho nageṣu sakaleṣu ca /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.95_1: tathā śreṣṭhaṃ bhaveccitraṃ sarvāsu hi kalāsu ca //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.96_0: nagnajid gaccha tasmāt tvaṃ viśvakarma samīpataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.99_1: citrasya lakṣaṇaṃ karma upadiśatu me prabho //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.100_0: vidhirvā parimāṇaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ vā bhavettathā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.101_1: citraśilpasya śāstraṃ tu tasmai rājñe hyupādiśat //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.105_1: brahmaṇaḥ kṛpayā labdhāḥ sarve śilpā mayā kṛtāḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_1.109_2: likhitvā vividhaṃ samyak tubhyaṃ mayā pradaśryate //
SA17nagcitpu:3_0: // iti nagnajiccitralakṣaṇanirdeśe nagnajayo nāma prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.1_0: yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam ācaṣṭe bhūpatiṃ tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.2_0: sthāvare jaṃgame naṣṭe pralayānte ca vai purā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.2_1: prādurabhūt suvarṇāṇḍaṃ tamo hatvā jalāt kila //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.5_0: sthānaṃ caryā ca dharmaśca nyāyaśca prābhavan tadā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.5_1: evaṃ kṛte sati brahmā-cintayat jagato hitam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.6_2: apramādena cādaraḥ sadā teṣu kathaṃ bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.7_0: brahmetthaṃ cintayitvā tu viṣṇoḥ śivasya cātmanaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.11_0: ime devāḥ prasannāśca svaptākāraṃ ca lebhire /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.12_0: prāha saptasurān brahmā astu puṇyaṃ samāśritam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.12_1: adya prabhṛti sarvatra yuṣmākaṃ pratimāsu ca /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.12_2: nātra śaṅkā kṛthā naraḥ pūjayiṣyati vaḥ sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.13_1: manuṣyeṣu ca yo nāma bhavantaṃ pūjayiṣyati /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.14_1: sarveṣā rakṣaṇa kṛtvā pāpān nāśayati dhruvam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.17_1: tayaiva dīyate śāntis tasmai bhaktāya sarvataḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.19_0: parimāṇādikaṃ teṣāṃ mattaḥ śrutvā ca lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.20_0: brahmaṇaśca mayā prāptaṃ vidyottamā ca lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_2.22_0: trilokeṣu ca pūjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.1_1: tat tathaiva pravakṣyāmi mānaṃ brūhi prajāsu ca //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.3_0: ye bhavanti ca teṣāṃ vai bhūpatonāṃ tatastathā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.5_2: aṣṭalikṣā bhaved yūkaḥ aṣṭayūkā yavaḥ smṛtaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.10_1: sākṣāt savarṇyate cātra purvoktaṃ vistareṇa ca //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.11_1: tribhāgena vibhaktaṃ ca samānena tathā budhaiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.14_1: dvātriṃśat tasya maṇdalam aṅgulīnāṃ hi mānataḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.18_1: narttane rodane krodhe cāpākārā bhavet sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.19_0: bhaye śoke ca bhrūprāntāv unnatau kramikau smṛtau /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.21_1: dvyaṅgulau hyakṣikoṣaḥ syān netramadhyaṃ tathaiva tu //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.27_0: kāmināṃ ca tathā strīṇāṃ netraṃ matsyodaraṃ bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.41_0: pañcāṅgulaṃ tu gaṇḍodhvaṃ adhaḥ syāt caturaṅgulam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.43_0: trikoṇā kuṭilā vṛttā naiva kāryā mukhākṛtiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.43_1: krodhayuk roṣayuk caiva na mukhaṃ syāt kadācana //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.44_1: susampanno bhaviṣyati nara iha ca sarvadā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.45_0: śāntikāmi mukhaṃ yat syād dīrghaṃ khartaṃ ca vartulam /

SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.48_1: jñeyaṃ tad dvyaṅgulaṃ nūnaṃ skandhāyāmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.48_2: daighrye tvaṣṭāṅgulo jñeyo vakṣastu dviguṇaṃ smṛtam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.50_0: jatruto hṛdayaṃ yāvan na kuṭilaḥ pradeśakaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.50_2: nābhito meṭraparyantaṃ samānaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.51_1: mānaṃ ca dahiṇāvarttaṃ yavaikaṃ cucukaṃ smṛtam //

SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.60_0: ucchrāyeṇa tu pārṣṇīnāṃ mānaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ matam /

SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.76_1: aṅguṣṭhe dve tu parvaṇī samenaika yavo bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.81_0: parvārdhena mitāḥ kāryā nakhāḥ sūkṣmāṃ nakhāgrakāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.82_0: parvaṃ dīrghaṃ ca vṛtaṃ ca karatalasuśobhanam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.84_2: sukhadaṃ cāru susparśaṃ kuryāt karatalaṃ śubham //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.85_0: samantān māṃsapūrṇaṃ vai nāṛī dṛśyā kadāpi na /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.85_1: hastapṛṣṭhaṃ sadā snigdham unnataṃ ca bhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.85_2: sūkṣmā aṅgulijālā hi sundaraṃ ca tanustathā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.87_1: bāhūnāṃ mānamārohaṃ dhīman śṛṇu vadāni te //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.88_0: ubhayostu tathā bāhvīr mānaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.92_0: hastau na jānuparyantau dīrdhau sūkṣrmau ca sundarau /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.95_1: yāni purvaṃ na coktāni tāni tubhyaṃ vadāmyaham //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.97_1: āyāme cāṅgulīnāṃ hī saṃkhyā yāyād navānvitā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.99_1: puruṣāṇāmidaṃ mānaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāgaḥ sa eva hi /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.101_1: caturaṅgulaṃ sthānaṃ syāt pāyustu dvyuṅgulaṃ matam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.104_1: varṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ caiva devamukhe na dīyate //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.107_0: dantamūlaṃ tathā tālu jihvāsīmā ca lohitam /

SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.116_1: vakṣasthalaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca śobhitaṃ syāt sulakṣaṇam //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.116_2: devabhūtamanuṣyāṇāṃ mukhe śmaśru na roma ca //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.123_0: veśadṛśāṃ gatiṃ cātha atikramya ca sarveṣām /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.125_1: samantāt kiraṇāvṛtaḥ rājā lekhyaḥ kṛśaḥ sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.127_2: bhrūvoḥ kaṇṭhasya bhālasya saundaryaṃ hi mukhasya ca //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.128_1: cārvoṣṭaṃ raktimāpūrṇaṃ svacchā dantā nabho yathā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.129_0: dīrdhottama ca pakṣma hi snigdhavarṇaṃ bhavettathā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.129_1: nīlaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ ca cakṣuḥ syāt sumanoharam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.135_1: mukheṣu connatā jñeyā gulpho 'dṛśpo bhavet tathā //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.139_0: tejasvī vīryavān rājan cakravarttī sadā bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.140_0: dehe jaṅghopajaṅghā ca bhṛśaṃ vikaśitā bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.140_1: suhastau caraṇau syātāṃ tathā parva ca dṛśyate //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.141_1: śobhitau ca bhujau syātāṃ deho mānānvito bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.144_0: upayukteṣu sarveṣu parimāṇaṃ tu yatra ca /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.144_1: tatra svāṅgulinā kāryaṃ mānaṃ sarvatra karmaṇi //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.146_2: pratimā sā parityaktā suradevaiḥ sadā khalu //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.147_0: piśācā rākṣasā bhūtā vasanti tvarita tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.147_1: śobhitān nāśayanti ca amaṅgalaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.151_0: apriyo na yathā yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vicārayet /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.152_0: caturṇāṃ ca tathā rājñāṃ parimāṇasya lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.152_1: brahmaṇā tu pradarśitaṃ vistaraṃ bravīmi te //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.153_0: sarvasya lekhane granthe vistāro bhavati dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.155_1: tubhyaṃ pradarśayāmi ced gacched grantho viśālatām //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.157_0: ato buddhayā suniścitya bhadro lekhyo vicārayan /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.161_0: ucchrāyo navarat strīṇā jñeya ekāṅguliḥ kṛśaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.162_2: āroho nāpriyo yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vidhīyatām //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.163_2: nārīṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ śṛṇu krameṇa hi //
SA17nagcitpu:ncit_3.164_0: rājñāṃ yathā pradarśitaṃ mānena ca tathāyutam /
